content.question: The trend in late October and early November showing Clinton ahead but an increase in support for Trump most likely would be

choices.label: used by Clinton to assure her supporters of a likely victory
described as momentum by the trailing Trump campaign to encourage supporters to vote
the result of the margin of error, which might lead one to believe Trump was possibly ahead
a result of unscientific polling practices by polling organizations

content.answer: described as momentum by the trailing Trump campaign to encourage supporters to vote

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
